text: Do people use Jupyter notebooks inside VSCode with Julia? I don’t seem to be able to run code

elements.text: Do people use Jupyter notebooks inside VSCode with Julia? I don’t seem to be able to run code

text: I tried for the first time last week but wasn’t able to connect to a julia kernel. I’d be interested to know if you found a fix for this :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: I tried for the first time last week but wasn’t able to connect to a julia kernel. I’d be interested to know if you found a fix for this

text:
mine seems to be working now.
I found this in my .vscode dir settings.json, which is plausibly necessary:
`{`
    `"jupyter.jupyterServerType": "local"`
`}`
